summary: Great retextures for Drow Race by Zazemel.
descriptionHtml:
FEMALE DROW RETEXTURES

Description:
I created these textures so players have more options on how they want there character to look. I plan to update with more tweaks and alterations to make this mod even better. The original textures were not compatible with GlossTech which was a bummer. Adding the gloss would overwrite the unique tattoos. I went about adding my own gloss while still managing to keep the tattoos for those who wanted gloss but still wanted the tattoos.

Features:
New and improved skin texture replacing the blue gumdrop nipples on the original and replacing the naughty bits on the bottom so it isn\'t so dark. 

Now have a version with the default blue gumdrop nipples and gloss for people who find it, um... erotic?

Added gloss to the skin while keeping the original shiny tattoos intact. Comes in the 5 default settings for GlossTech.

Updates:
I plan to update frequently with new custom tattoos in place of the default, again with gloss added so you can have your cake and eat it too.

Glitches:
None so far but if you get any leave a post and I can try to confirm it. I will not be providing support for his actual mod as my forte is textures and not the mods themselves. Always make sure you have the most up to date version of his mod to avoid problems.

With the Ultra Gloss version the tattoos are still there and can be seen in game, screen shot you can barely see them. I don\'t suggest that high of gloss but if it\'s what you like I can\'t stop you but be aware the screenshot does not show how it really looks with a moving character.

Installation:
Requires the original Drow Race files by Zazemel to work. You can find it here: [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=16399]Drow Race[/url] 

Just unzip to desktop or your prefered location and choose your option and replace the original textures from the Drow Race by Zazemel.

Credits:
Zazemel for creating such a wonderful race with which I was allowed to modify for the good of the players.

Have a Suggestion?
Feel free to leave me a comment regarding something you would want to see in an update and if I like it I just might make it. Do not suggest making the child race nude because I will have no part in that. Child has gloss and you should be happy with that.
author: Digitalmax
